text: Why the big grin? ...What are you looking at?

It's a photo we took with the water gun last time.
Want to see, Juri?
Look, everyone looks so lively, right?

Oh...! This one's just too funny.
The splashes really give it a summer vibe!

Hmm...
You can skip over that part.

Huh? But it's a photo of you, Juri?
Look at this smile, it's so adorab--
